title: Career rushing yards leaders - Los Angeles Rams 1937 to 2020
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Rushing yards in the y axis.
Month Steven Jackson has the highest Rushing yards and Tommy Wilson has the lowest Rushing yards.
The highest Month Steven Jackson has 8008.0 more Rushing yards than the lowest Month Tommy Wilson.
